text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    HIV.B.DE22Provider-initiated tested in a clinic or emergency facilityEntry point for facility-level testing - Provider-initiated tested in a clinic or emergency facility
    HIV.B.DE23Antenatal care clinicEntry point for facility-level testing - Antenatal care clinic
    HIV.B.DE24Voluntary counselling and testing (within a health facility setting)Entry point for facility-level testing - Voluntary counselling and testing (within a health facility setting)
    HIV.B.DE25Family planning clinicEntry point for facility-level testing - Family planning clinic
    HIV.B.DE26Other facility-level testingEntry point for facility-level testing - Other facility-level testing
    HIV.B.DE27Tuberculosis (TB) clinicEntry point for facility-level testing - Tuberculosis (TB) clinic

name: EntrypointforfacilityleveltestingCodes
title: Entry point for facility-level testing Codes
description: Codes representing possible values for the Entry point for facility-level testing element
